title: Booklet, "Folder for "A program for the New Whitney Museum"", 1964
medium: Lithography in red, blue and black ink on off-whote wove paper
inscribed: Imprinted at lower center in black ink: a/ program/ for the/ new/ Whitney Museum/ in the/ service of/ American art
creditline: Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff
description: On top of the folder is the logo consisting of red, white and blue
